typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as string,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfoCSV
EmpInfoCSV sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	stageInsert: true) ~> SnowDB01
